g.title: leaf_14
g.text: Walks a given directory, kniting the contents of =/org/=

g.title: leaf_15
g.text: - [X] TODO fix up the orb/notes directory so it doesn't explode

g.title: leaf_17
g.text: for dir in pl_dir.walk(orb_dir, false, false) do
if not strHas(".git", dir) and isdir(dir)
-- make a copy of current_src just in case
-- if nothing changes, no rollback is needed, empty file
for dir in pl_dir.walk(pwd, false, false) do
if not strHas(".git", dir) and isdir(dir)
s:chat("No orb directory to knit. No action taken.")
